com.ibm.is.cc.javastage.api

Class ColumnTransferBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.is.cc.javastage.api.ColumnTransferBehavior

  • public class ColumnTransferBehavior
extends Object
    An enumeration type represents the column transfer behaviors supported by Java Integration stage.
    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Capabilities.setColumnTransferBehavior(int), Capabilities.getColumnTransferBehavior()

    • Field Detail

      • COPY_COLUMNS_FROM_SINGLE_INPUT_TO_ALL_OUTPUTS

        public static final int COPY_COLUMNS_FROM_SINGLE_INPUT_TO_ALL_OUTPUTS
        Bitmask specifies the column transfer behavior for the case when there is a single input link and one or more output links.

        The behavior is as follows:

        • Columns not set by the user's code on an output link are copied from the current input record when user's code writes a record to the output link.
        • If multiple output records are output per single input record, the input column values for the current input record are repeated for each output record.
        • If multiple input records are consumed per single output record, the input column values from the last (current) input record are copied to the output.
        This behavior is enabled by default. If the user's code wants a different behavior, then the user's code should disable this default behavior by calling: 

         Capability.setColumnTransferBehavior(ColumnTransferBehavior.DISABLE_AUTOMATIC_TRANSFER)

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COPY_COLUMNS_FROM_ALL_INPUTS_TO_SINGLE_OUTPUT

        public static final int COPY_COLUMNS_FROM_ALL_INPUTS_TO_SINGLE_OUTPUT
        Bitmask specifies the column transfer behavior for the case when there is one or more input links and single output link.

        This will be supported in a future release of Java Integration stage.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COPY_COLUMNS_FROM_FIRST_INPUT_TO_ALL_OUTPUTS

        public static final int COPY_COLUMNS_FROM_FIRST_INPUT_TO_ALL_OUTPUTS
        Bitmask specifies the column transfer behavior for the case when there is multiple input links and multiple output links.

        This will be supported in a future release of Java Integration stage.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DISABLE_AUTOMATIC_TRANSFER

        public static final int DISABLE_AUTOMATIC_TRANSFER
        Bitmask specifies all of column transfer behaviors are disabled.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
